website_summaries.verdict: Combines power, features, and accessories to deliver exceptional performance – the best available when choosing a Bissell vacuum.
pros: Has Bissell's patented Cyclonic action dirt collection for hands-free removal and precisely designed brush roll that prevents hair tangles
cons: It's somewhat heavy and a bit awkward to use, but it makes up for these concerns with its reliable features and performance

customer_reviews.title: I love this vacuum cleaner!
customer_reviews.text: I did my own test by vacuuming with my old vacuum (which was a basic Bissell I thought was pretty good). Then I followed with this one and was amazed by the amount of dirt and hair it picked up. I love this vacuum cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: A. J. HILL

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum is pretty much useless. If you enjoy shoving your hand into the bagless compartment to try and clear off the area that creates the suction and also happens to trap all the pet hair, which is constantly getting clogged, so that you're essentially digging around in everything you just vacuumed up. Then this vacuum is for you. Otherwise stay away, stay far away.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Best Vacuum by far!!!
customer_reviews.text: This the best vacuum I've ever had. When I think the floor is clean it proves me wrong which can also be a little terrifying & make me want to buy hardwood floors, but I'm happy that this Bissell cleans so well. My favorite feature has to be the no hair wrap floor bar. My hair always would wrap around any other vacuum I've owned causing it to clog up & not do it's job as well. This technology truly Keepes hair from wrapping around the bar. The best ever!! Thanks Bissell The pictures are after using it. It collected so much after I had already used my old vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Blanton

customer_reviews.title: It won't pick up cat litter or smaller particles from hardwood floors.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second review for Model 1650 A. After three years, it's going in the trash. We have mostly hardwood floors and two area rugs. It works on the low pile area rugs, but the wood flooring is a different story. I finally had to do a pre sweep before vacuuming. No matter what I tried, the vacuum wouldn't pick up cat litter. I changed the filters . made sure the seals were tight. Nothing worked. Now the hose has broken for the third time, so it's time to dump this useless machine.
customer_reviews.author: Marian

customer_reviews.title: I have had it less than two years, and it has broken twice.
customer_reviews.text: I haven't even had this vacuum for two years, and it has broken twice. I am upset because I spent more money to buy what I thought was a nice vacuum because I was sick of buying vacuums. But this one has been way worse than my $80 Walmart vacuum. I take care of my vacuums too, cleaning the filters and canisters out after every use. So disappointed with this product and upset that I spend so much on it. I will never buy another Bissell.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t provide advertised promises!
customer_reviews.text: I am very disappointed with my “Bissell Pet Eraser” vacuum! Is does not pick up pet hair off carpeting as advertised. It is an expensive vacuum cleaner that is not worth the price of purchase. Bissell has falsely rated this vacuum cleaner’s abilities. I will never buy another Bissell product again! I’m stuck with a poorly function machine & cannot afford to but another brand at this time.
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn A Riley

customer_reviews.title: once I was able to get all the switches and dials coordinated the vacuum does a wonderful job. However
customer_reviews.text: First off, once I was able to get all the switches and dials coordinated the vacuum does a wonderful job. However, the hose is much too short, the machine is too top heavy so it tends to fall over when trying to reach for cobwebs. As a result, after 2 uses the attachment bracket has broken off. And, despite what they say, I did have to reach into the canister with my hands to remove cat hair. I'm sorry I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Elbat53

customer_reviews.title: We were SHOCKED at how much dog hair this vaccumed up!
customer_reviews.text: Our carpets had just been vaccumed the same day this arrived. We fired it up and could not believe how much dog hair it picked up! And it was SO lightweight and easy to maneuver! It reached places our last one could not. Dare I say it was even fun to use? Lol. We have 3 Boxers so we need a reliable vaccum. We have it now!!
customer_reviews.author: DetBeri

customer_reviews.title: Not Impressed
customer_reviews.text: Really thought this would be my last vacuum cleaner. NOT SURE recv'd and quickly put together. Used immediately, did pk up usual trash, but the No Tangle of hair advertised is not true after running over carpets I still had to flip it up and remove hair tangled around brush head. Granted not as much as usual, still present. I have one small 10 lb. Dog, but 2 females w/ long hair in my household. And I hate it, sweeping and cleaning all that hair, I was looking for an easier fix when it comes to removing all that hair. Guess I'll keep looking
customer_reviews.author: Robin, Denver

customer_reviews.title: Great for short pile carpets with dogs
customer_reviews.text: I really this vacuum. Bissell's are the best for handling dog hair and an affordable price. Only complaint is that I still have to reach up and clean out the hair from the tank. And I have to empty the tank halfway through the living room. But I have two large, long-haired double-coated dogs. Good suction and lightweight so it's easy to carry up stairs while vacuuming.
customer_reviews.author: Trinalyn

customer_reviews.title: Worst vacuum I ever purchased
customer_reviews.text: I have a dog, and this vacuum picks up absolutely nothing. I'm sorry I missed the window of time to return it. I was trying to give it a chance and re-read the instructions as maybe I was doing something incorrectly in the operation of the vacuum, but this was not the case. Don't waste money on this. I should have purchased another Dyson Animal Vacuum. My old one worked for nine years without fail.
customer_reviews.author: Susan L

customer_reviews.title: I was so excited when I bought this and it came in but its a 100% a total disappointment my old 20
customer_reviews.text: Unless you want to vacuum your living room for a half hour and still not have it pick everything up. This is NOT the vacuum for you! It literally can't pick up crumbs that my husband has dropped. I was so excited when I bought this and it came in but its a 100% a total disappointment my old 20.00 walmart vacuum does a much better job this this crap machine. Please don't waste you time or money on this vacuum its not worth it
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Not What You Would Expect
customer_reviews.text: I have owned Bissell floor cleaners for years and loved them. I decided to try this vacuum cleaner. I found it difficult to operate. Its ok if the dirt is right in front of you. It's not good in small spaces or tight spots so I find myself having to lift the entire vacuum to get where I need it. By the time I vacuum a few rooms, my back is hurting. I don't usually get back aches. I have gone back to my old vacuum cleaner. I would definitely not buy this again or recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: SeaQ

customer_reviews.title: Great Vacuum
customer_reviews.text: We replaced our vacuum with this one and couldn't be happier. Unlike other vacuums we have owned, changing from the main carpet roller to the hose/handheld tool is easy, by simply twisting a knob. No need to unplug hoses and plug them into other places. It does a really good job at cleaning up our dog's hair and doesn't appear to be getting any hair buildup in the brushes. The swivel action is pretty nice as well.
customer_reviews.author: Chase R Palmer

customer_reviews.title: Best pet hair vacuum!! Awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm one of those people that usually don't leave reviews... But this vacuum is amazing! I've gone through three or four different vacuums in the last two years. I have a wolf malamute husky hybrid and some of his Fur is over a foot long! I may leave another review in a year or two if the vacuum is still doing good but I'm amazed the hair does not get tangled in the brush roll at all!... I don't know how they do it :-)
customer_reviews.author: Fred Martin

customer_reviews.title: My grown daughter's hair was getting tangled in vacuum rollers
customer_reviews.text: Love this vacuum! My daughter's hair was getting tangled in my old vacuum's roller, and causing it to shut down. It was a pain to cut the hair off. I researched all of the pet vacuums, and hoped that this "no tangle" roller would do the trick. It worked! The vacuum itself was very easy to assemble, and I clean both floors of the house at once. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: jib

customer_reviews.title: greatest pet vacuum ever
customer_reviews.text: greatest pet vacuum ever! I had another brand that had been rated as being good for pets. I used it for years. I didn't like how the canister was to clean so i purchased this Bissell and realized i hadn't know clean until now. The swivel motion makes it so light and easy to get around furniture and i love the febreeze smell after i use it! THe one touch canister is heaven. SO EASY!! I didn't have to spend a fortune either! I am so happy i read all the reviews because that is what drew me to it and everyone was right about it- awesome!!
customer_reviews.author: Katmeowno

customer_reviews.title: GREAT for long haired pets
customer_reviews.text: I just received this vacuum yesterday and tried it today. I have three other vacuums. I also have Ragdoll cats. If you are familiar with Ragdolls, you know what kind of hair I have to deal with. Previously I would have to stop every few minutes to clean the hair out of the brushes. I was actually able to vacuum the entire house and there are only a couple of hairs on the brushes. I am very pleased with this product at this point. I just hope it continues to work for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Sara G Conrad

customer_reviews.title: This vacuum absolutely sucks. It's constantly getting clogged
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum absolutely sucks. It's constantly getting clogged, it has to be on the bare floor setting to get the pet hair out of our carpet. Day one out of the box was even disappointing. We are a multi dog home, 2 great danes and 1 95 pound mix with very long hair. I like the tool that gets into small spaces, but that's if there is minimal dirt. I do like the rotating brush because I haven't had to clip hair out of that, but the rest is just straight disappointing. I purchased off of reviews, so I don't know if I just got a bad machine or what. I'm going to be purchasing another today.
customer_reviews.author: John and Amanda

customer_reviews.title: IM FREE AT LAST , THANK GOD ALMIGHTY IM FREE AT LAST OF PET HAIR...!!!
customer_reviews.text: Well have to say...im SO HAPPY...had some issues for a day or so ..bought it in feb and just opened the box 3 days ago..and couldnt figure it out but thanks to bissell customer support and the helpful customers on here...I GOT IT!! And omg im sooo pleased....i have a bulldog and hes sheeds like its goin out of style...lol
customer_reviews.author: patricia

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Low stars are for amazon, not the product. Love it, one of the suction tubes has a nice dent but amazon wants me to go through the manufacturer for a replacement. That's a lot of trouble and waste of my time. Due to covid19 bissell has reduced customer care hours, have long hold times, and are not accepting email inquiries.
customer_reviews.author: Mel Johnso

customer_reviews.title: Just do it!
customer_reviews.text: If you're like me, a Dyson upright fan, don't hesitate to try a switch to Bissell. I used to think only Dyson had the great suction. Guess again. This beats Dyson in suction, flexibility/reach, and handle-ability...it's light weight and cruises almost on own. At 1st, I was intimidated to open the box and put it together, but that too, was actually easy. Each piece snapped right in place. I've only used it once, but love the Febreeze filter & attachments, especially the LED lighted crevice tool. I almost hate to admit my house has never been this clean.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Don't spend your money on this!
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, if I could rate this no stars that's what I would have rated it. It has very little to no suction from the main floor cleaning apparatus. I even double check the filters to make sure everything was placed incorrectly. It can't even suck up the dog hair off of my wooden floors, even though it states that at can. The very first time we used the pet turbo eraser, it worked for 2 minutes and then broke. We had to contact bissell.com for them to send us a new one. Overall, it's just a poorly made vacuum cleaner. Do not waste your money on this. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Adhenderson

customer_reviews.title: Wish I had not purchased this!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this model from Amazon recently due to the high ratings and also a previous pet model made by Bissell I had owned in the past. The only good thing is it is quiet, that being said there is so little suction power and the hand tools hardly pick up anything!!!! I will never purchase an electronic item on line again. I threw away all the boxes so I can’t return it (stupid me) and on top of that the stated sale price was 199.00 and I was charged 249.00 plus tax. Target and Walmart sell this model for less money too. Lesson learned the very had way.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Robertson

customer_reviews.title: It's OK
customer_reviews.text: I wish I'd had an opportunity to try this vacuum prior to purchase. Not as versatile or friendly to use as my previous SHARK vacuum. Chose this product over Shark because of the new roller brush, but it does not make up for the other issues that are inconvenient, such as switching from floor to hose, wand is too short for some tasks, heavier than anticipated, have to reach into the trash container to remove and clean out..so have to get my hands dirty. Not likely recommend this to friends.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: ... pets but I have long hair and it sheds like a dogs hair
customer_reviews.text: I don't have pets but I have long hair and it sheds like a dogs hair, so it tangles up around the brush on bottom and ruins the vaccuum. I love this product because it picks up my hair and does not ruin the vaccuum. I am sooo glad I bought it after researching for 6 months to find the right vaccuum!!
customer_reviews.author: L M R

customer_reviews.title: Chocolate lab and 5 year old
customer_reviews.text: We like it better than our old Dyson. The floors look pretty clean. Were not getting the whole hair stuck up top thing like some people state in other reviews. It doesn't get pulled around when using the hose. The old Dyson would fall over and roll when pulling the hose. (Dyson animal was expensive junk) Very happy so far and it's our second Bissell purchase first being a carpet cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Judson

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I bought this vacume hoping it would perform as promised after being very disappointed with others I have had and thinking if I spent a little more money on a well-reviewed product, it would work. Horrible in corners, poor suction on bare floors and even worse with the wand. It is also heavy and cumbersome to maneuver. Sadly, this one goes out to the curb as it is too late to return.
customer_reviews.author: BKM62

customer_reviews.title: ... had this vacuum for a couple months now and love it. It picked up pet hair way better ...
customer_reviews.text: I have had this vacuum for a couple months now and love it. It picked up pet hair way better than any previous vacuum I have owned. I did a lot of research prior to purchasing this product and the physical results have validated every good thing I read.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: It's a little annoying to have to turn the knob on the base ...
customer_reviews.text: We basically live in a zoo so we have lots of experience with vacuums. We have dogs and cats plus we foster so there is plenty of fur to go around. This vacuum handles it well. It's quiet and capable. It's a little annoying to have to turn the knob on the base of the vacuum when I want to switch from floor suction to wand suction but it's a minor inconvenience. Overall, we are satisfied with its performance on both carpet and bare floors.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah McRoberts

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good!
customer_reviews.text: I just recently purchased this sweeper, so can't give an indepth review. It took me time to get used the "swivel" action when I push it - until I got used to it, it wanted to go its own way, but I learned how to move it where I wanted it. I cannot comment on stairs, as I don't have any, but for carpet and hardwood floors, collecting hair and using the hose for couches/chairs, it is working well.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Gibson

customer_reviews.title: Good for price
customer_reviews.text: I like this vacuum. It does most of what it says it can do! Hair doesn’t get stuck on roller. My carpets look pretty good! The only two things I don’t like.... having to switch manually between floor and hose. And that the hair and dirt in the container does get stuck and need to be pulled out by hand. Bissell advertises hair doesn’t get suck, but it does.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Medsker

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 cats and a large dog. This is the best vac I have ever used. Picks up twice as much hair as my and eureka vacs. Light weight, quiet and handles nice. Easy to empty and replace filters and clean. So far no hair stuck in the spinning thing. I also enjoy the frebeeze filters, nice fresh scent. Only draw back, it doesn't feel as durable as those more expensive vacs out there, so handle with care.
customer_reviews.author: Tmanqz

customer_reviews.title: Pet Hair Master
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 Siberian Huskies and thought it would be impossible to get all the hair... my old vacuum couldn't pick it up at all. I use to have to get down on my hands and knees with a small bristle dog brush and scrap the carpet to get it off the carpet. I haven't picked up the hair in 3 weeks.. I gave this new vacuum the ultimate test... and it passed with flying colors. It got aALL the hair. I could ask for a better vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bad smell and unable to return!
customer_reviews.text: I just received this product last week and I started using it everything seemed fine but then it has a really badd burn odor smell to it. I called customer service was not very helpful when it comes to returning it since the box it came in was ruined and I was unable to return if. They should be able to send a new bow out under this situation. A vacuum is big and all they could say was use two boxes... sorry that's just crazy! Now im stuck with a 200 dollar vaccum that has problems and cant return to get a refund
customer_reviews.author: Marsheila Kerner

customer_reviews.title: Main hose broke after 1.5 yrs
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased this product about a little over a year ago and have been very happy with it that I suggested it to all my fellow husky owners. I've been taking good care of it, cleaning it regulary, replacing filters.. However I have recently realized that the main hose is broken and I wish I was able to replace this part considering how much I paid for it..
customer_reviews.author: Ceren P

product_meta.title: Bissell Pet Hair Eraser 1650A Upright Vacuum with Tangle Free Brushroll
product_meta.description:
Style Name:Pet Hair EraserNothing puts a vacuum to the test quite like a home with pets. That's why the Bissell pet hair eraser was developed from the ground up by pet parents for pet parents. Whether it's shedding season for your dog or your cat tracks Kitty litter all over the house, this revolutionary vacuum is designed to make cleaning up after pets and the people who love them a breeze-from beginning to end. Say goodbye to hair wrap with its tangle-free brush roll, remove embedded hair everywhere with specialized pet tools, help capture allergens and eliminate odors with the smart seal Allergen system and when you're finished cleaning, enjoy a hands-free tank empty with our patented cyclonic spooling system.

BRAND STORY
By Bissell
feature_bullets: Tangle-free brush roll, specialized pet tools - remove embedded pet hair everywhere
NEW pet turboeraser tool, new snap on handle- 2in1 pet brush, brush on/off for scatter free cleaning
Swivel steering, edge to edge cleaning with suction channel technology
DIRT cup capacity: 1.5L, power cord length: 30ft.Surface Height Settings:5

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars1,431 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
